hadiths.text: A'isha reported Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) as saying:When Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) visited the sick he would say: Lord of the people. remove the disease, cure him, for Thou art the great Curer, there is no cure but through Thine healing Power, which leaves nothing of the disease

chapter.eng-name: It Is Recommended To Recite Ruqyah For One Who Is Sick
